metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1481 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Sharing in Google Chrome on Mac prior to 101.0.4951.41allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
